metadata.title: CVE-2020-6631 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0. There is a NULL pointerdereference in the function gf_m2ts_stream_process_pmt() inmedia_tools/m2ts_mux.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
